data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Bataan, Philippines know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bataan, Philippines
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bataan, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 156 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Bataan, Philippines.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, may the churches in Bataan, Philippines honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Bataan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Hanunoo people. 1.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, you gave the church of Bataan, Philippines the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 105,964 believers in Bataan against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bataan, Philippines has a population of 760,700.

We estimate Bataan has 105,964 people who might know Jesus, 586,009 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 68,727 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Bataan to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
